b: the complete solution for all outdoor activities and sports
on-line topographic maps, which will remain available
you are localized in real-time on the map

b.b: Don't hesitate, try the free Lite version right now!
Don't hesitate, use it right now for free!

b: All-In-One OfflineMaps offers you to access a wide range of maps for free.
All-In-One OfflineMaps+ offers you to access a wide range of maps.
Once displayed, maps are stored and remain available, quickly, even with no network access
Want more than just roads on your maps?
Used to go to places with poor network coverage?

b.b: This Plus version includes all features of the Standard version without ads, and supports import of professional GPS and geographic landmarks file formats (waypoints, routes, tracks, areas) like GPX, Google Earth KML/KMZ (map overlays not supported), OziExplorer WPT, CVS/TSV and Geocaching LOC

b: Display, store and retrieve unlimited landmarks
string: We need you! Support us by leaving a comment on the Google Play Store, it\'s free and only takes few seconds!
To get help, ask any question, give suggestions, report bugs, don\'t hesitate:
Maps are retrieved from the internet. All displayed areas are stored locally to remain readily available even when offline.\nThere are plenty of available maps that can all be displayed in layers.
Want to get rid of the ads?
Support us and get the Plus version without ads:

You can browse and install new maps from the community:

Create an empty file able to contain various landmarks.
Be notified when approaching the marked location.
Measure distances and bearings between two or more points on the map.
Compute slopes between two or more points based on user entered elevations.
Automatically draw a path following the roads on the map.
The search failed.\nYou need to have an Internet data access to search a location by name.
Cannot activate the compass: no magnetic sensor on this device.
Compute declination to get true north
To get precise results using the barometer, you need to calibrate it.\nPlace yourself at a known elevation (you may use the GPS altitude) and enter it as a reference.
The current reference pressure is %s at %s.
Resume current track or start a new one?
Failed to save the current track. Delete the data?

There is no location source available on this device.
Uses locations provided by Outdoor GPS and Network.
Provides accurate locations computed from the GPS satellites (no network needed). Requires view of sky and initializing time.
Provides inaccurate locations retrieved from the wireless networks.
Uses locations provided by other applications.
Battery consuming, for short runs with volatile speed.
Economy mode recommended for day long hikes.

Enter any EPSG/ESRI/SR-ORG coordinate system id from:
Coordinate system \"%s\" not supported yet. Please contact us on our support forum so we can work on it.
When in fullscreen mode, use the menu button to display the status bar.
Also hide the software navigation bar when displaying the map in full screen.
Never turn the screen off when displaying the map view.

Use the volume buttons to zoom in or zoom out the map.
Define where to store downloaded maps.
Your system prevents usage of this location.
This location will be deleted by the system when you uninstall the application.
Define the size of texts in the information boxes displayed on the map.
Define the background colour of the information boxes displayed on the map.
Define which zoom controls are displayed on the map.
Automatically lock the zoom value on map levels.
Allow to control the map zoom with two fingers.
Allow to control the map orientation with two fingers.
Display size of the map on the screen.
Size of landmarks (paths, waypoints, icons) displayed on the map.
Default colour of landmarks displayed on the map.
Colour of targeted landmark displayed on the map.
Draw a border for landmarks displayed on the map.
Draw a shadow for landmarks displayed on the map.
Display time bounds of tracks displayed on the map.
Improve accuracy of tracks by filtering and correcting points before display.
Disable localisation when the application runs in background to save battery.
Automatically relock the screen centre on the current GPS location after 10s of inactivity.
Display on the map the heading of the current GPS location.
Display the previous GPS locations on the map.
Compute more precise elevations using the EGM96 geoid model.
Sorry, no suitable application is currently installed on your device to handle this action.
Sorry, the external application used is not compatible with this application.
Real elevations, computed from the GPS altitudes and shape of the Earth.
Real elevations, computed from the calibrated pressure data (known to be more precise than GPS altitudes) and shape of the Earth.
Differences between barometric and geoid elevations.
Instant speeds, computed from the GPS locations and times.
Slope values between each locations, computed from the GPS altitudes.
Uncalibrated pressures, as given by the barometer.
Computed pressures at the sea level, computed from the GPS altitudes and pressure data.
Accuracy of locations, with a 68% confidence.
